document.full_text: u-prince  - it looked just like a revved-up final election campaign rally, with crowds of fanatical supporters mobbing their candidate, chanting his praises and waving his portrait and haitian flags.
document.title: aristide not on haiti ballot but on voters' minds
lines_and_colors: u-prince  - it looked just like a revved-up final election campaign rally, with crowds of fanatical supporters mobbing their candidate, chanting his praises and waving his portrait and haitian flags.
